Package PE2_F21

Class Music

java.lang.Object
PE2_F21.PerformingArt
PE2_F21.Music
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Art>, Art
class Music
extends PerformingArt
This is the Music class. This class has four instance variables that show the name of the composer of this piece of music, the name of the music itself, an arrayList of all the notes that comprises this music and exceptionCode that shows the type of the exceptions that are thrown by the methods of this class.
Author:
MAHFUZ RAHAMAN

    • play

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Art art)
      This method compares two music objects.
      Parameters:
      art - takes an input of an instance of Art. It is then casted to Music type. This method handles excptions incase the input parameter art is not of type Music.
      Returns:
      It returns zero, if the name and the composer of the music is the same and both the scores are completely the same. If not, -1 is returned.
